importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Su Yiming won a gold medal at the Beijing Winter Olympics just days before turning 18, marking a pivotal moment in his career and global recognition.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: Su transitioned from child actor to professional snowboarder during this period, beginning full-time training and achieving major success at the 2022 Winter Olympics.

keyTakeAways: Su Yiming is a Chinese snowboarder who won a gold medal in men’s big air at the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics, becoming a national and international icon.
Before snowboarding, Su was a child actor, notably starring in the film 'The Taking of Tiger Mountain,' which helped establish his public profile in China.
Su's Olympic success led to significant global media attention and commercial partnerships with luxury brands, making him one of China’s most recognized young athletes.
After winning gold, Su took a year and a half off to recover mentally and physically, emphasizing the importance of rest and balance in elite sports.
Su is now preparing for the upcoming 2026 Winter Olympics in Italy, where he aims to retain his Olympic title amid increased pressure and expectations.
Beyond snowboarding, Su is involved in fashion, media, and lifestyle activities such as fishing, surfing, and playing pool, showcasing a diverse personal life rooted in nature and family.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Su Yiming, a Chinese snowboarder and former child actor, rose to global fame after winning a gold medal in men’s big air at the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics. His early success as a child actor in films like 'The Taking of Tiger Mountain' laid the foundation for his public recognition. After his Olympic triumph, Su took a year and a half off to recover mentally and physically, emphasizing the importance of balance and rest. Now preparing for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Italy, he continues to grow his influence through fashion, media, and lifestyle activities such as fishing and surfing. His journey reflects both the excitement of athletic achievement and the personal challenges of sustaining motivation after success.
title: From child actor to Olympic champion: Meet snowboarding superstar Su Yiming
